title: Author Profile: KirQ!
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:wilsons]]
[[div class="wilson-border"]]
[[div style="color:white; background: #a3c162;padding: 15px;"]]
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=]]
[[size 150%]]**Author Profile: KirQ!**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Overview!
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
[[f<image https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c1/Duck_on_Yeadon_Tarn_%2813th_November_2010%29_002.jpg/800px-Duck_on_Yeadon_Tarn_%2813th_November_2010%29_002.jpg width="300px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="Arorangi taking a gander at the camera."]]
**Name:** Kir
**Species:** //Anas platyrhynchos domesticus// (Domestic duck)
**Primary Caretaker:** No one can stop meeeeeeeee!
**Diet:** Acquasale, Biskotso, Bruschetta, BÃ¡nh mÃ¬, Croquette, toast,... just give me breaddddddddddddddddddddddddd
**Housed:** Enclosure 12, Wilson Wildlife Centre, Vietnamese branch.
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Creature Features!
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
quack quack quack, i'm a duck. i'm a big and white duck. i also like bread. give me bread. me want to eat. quack quack quack.

i can swim. You can't swim, right? Haha dummy. Me can swim all day and eat breads. Give me breaddddddddddd.

i can make you angry when i quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack quack

destroy the world, destroy humanity, destroy breaddd. yummy yummy breadddddddddddddddddd

[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
**History!**
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
[[=image https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Anas_platyrhynchos_qtl1.jpg/1280px-Anas_platyrhynchos_qtl1.jpg width="300px" style="border:1px solid #665731"]]
[[=]]
[[size 80%]]//Look me swimming!//[[/size]]
[[/=]]
me come from a beautiful place - tha void. if you want to see there, you just have to-- no you cant dummy, u will die :3
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: The SCP Foundation
Recipient(s): Tim Wilson
Date: 12/10/2021
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
Hey, Tim!
@@ @@
Can we have him please?
@@ @@
Thank you!
The O5 Council
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]

Recipient(s): The SCP Foundation
Date: 13/10/2021
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
@@ @@
No.
@@ @@
[[/div]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: The SCP Foundation
Recipient(s): Tim Wilson
Date: 15/10/2021
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
@@ @@
Pretty please ðŸ¥º
@@ @@
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: Tim Wilson
Recipient(s): The SCP Foundation
Date: 16/10/2021
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
@@ @@
Fine.
@@ @@
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

-----
Hi guys, welcome to my author page. My name is Kir and I'm Vietnamese. As you can see, I like ducks ;) I'm mostly active in the Vietnamese branch (my duty as Administrator), but sometimes I will try to write stuff here.

++++ My works:

* **[[[Big Fish In The Sky]]]** - When I saw [[*user Flawed]]'s tale [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/endless-light Some Are Born To Endless Light] and [[*user Westrin]]'s challenge (write a tale about Anomalous Item), I start to find an anomalous  item and my first child showed up. A short and sweet tale about friendship will make you smile :) OMG, it has audio [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vkXrrR11s6g version] by  [[*user TheeSherm]], yayyy!

* **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/kir-artwork KirQ's Artwork Page]** - My artwork page, sometimes I will try to update it (though I'm not a good artist à²¥â€¿à²¥)

* **[[[A New Chance To Explore Life]]]** - My first entry for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/department-contest DEPARTMENT-CON 2022]. This is some sort of introduction tale for our team (**The Foehn Revolt** - [[*user UnnaHuz]] &  [[*user KirQ]] & [[*user AWeirdBird]]) - EduSkip Division, check it out!

* **[[[First Lesson]]]** - A sequel tale for **A New Chance To Explore Life**. All you have to know is the //first lesson// for a young researcher in this paranormal world.

++++ My works in the Vietnamese branch:

Check out the translation, thank you [[*user Irina Bougainvillea]] ^^:

* **[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-012-vn SCP-012-VN - One Gains, What One Wishes]**: SCP-012-VN is an anomalous phenomenon affecting the isolated â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ village, which belongs to the â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Province, Vietnam...
* **[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-014-vn SCP-014-VN - Dream Crayonsâ„¢]** (ft. [[*user StupifPotato]]): SCP-014-VN is a box of crayons, with no trademark printed outside the box...

Finally, thank you for checking my author page! Have a nice day (ã¥ï½¡â—•â€¿â€¿â—•ï½¡)ã¥.
author: KirQ
